fields.Thank You Note: Thanks to your incredible generosity, the boys at Eagle Rock now have access to gaming consoles that bring joy and connection into their lives. "I love playing games with my friends; it makes me feel like I belong," shared Marcus, age 15. Your donations have made a difference by giving these boys a healthy and fun outlet for their energy and creativity. You’ve given them a reason to smile every day, and for that, we are truly thankful.
fields.Impact Text: At Eagle Rock Boys' Home, the gaming systems you’ve provided will impact over 50 boys annually, giving them a much-needed outlet for relaxation and social interaction. “Gaming gives our boys a chance to bond with each other, build friendships, and learn healthy competition,” says Director Samuel Reid. These new gaming systems will be a vital part of our recreation and therapy programs, offering the boys a positive escape and helping them build important life skills.
fields.Map Short Thank You: Thank you for bringing joy and connection to Eagle Rock boys!
fields.Thank You Note Title: Thank You from Eagle Rock Boys' Home
fields.Impact Title: Gaming Brings Fun and Support to Eagle Rock Boys

fields.Thank You Note: We are incredibly grateful for your generosity. Because of your support, RMH St. Louis now offers a vibrant gaming area where children and their families can laugh and play together. "I love playing games with my brother; it makes me forget about the hospital," said Emily, age 8. Your kindness has provided a much-needed escape for kids and their families during challenging times. Thank you for bringing so much happiness and light into their lives.
fields.Impact Text: The new gaming lounge at RMH St. Louis, made possible by your donations, will serve more than 300 families annually. These families, who often stay for extended periods, now have a space where children can enjoy moments of normalcy through gaming. “The smiles we’ve seen from children when they first sit down to play are priceless,” says Sarah Moore, Family Services Coordinator. Gaming is not just entertainment — it’s a vital part of their emotional support during difficult times. Your contributions are making a difference.
fields.Map Short Thank You: Thank you for bringing happiness to kids at RMH St. Louis!
fields.Thank You Note Title: A Grateful Thank You from RMH St. Louis Kids
fields.Impact Title: Gaming Gear Transforms RMH St. Louis Experience

fields.Thank You Note: Thank you for helping us create moments of happiness for the children at Lowell General. "Playing my favorite games helps me forget that I'm in the hospital," said Maya, age 9. Because of your generosity, our pediatric playrooms are now filled with laughter and smiles. These new gaming consoles have become a source of joy and comfort, helping children cope with their treatments and feel less isolated. You’ve made a lasting impact, and we are deeply grateful for your support.
fields.Impact Text: Lowell General Hospital now serves more than 400 children each year with newly equipped gaming stations in our pediatric playrooms. "We’ve seen how gaming helps children relax and manage their emotions," says Karen White, a child life specialist at the hospital. The new gaming systems offer our young patients an opportunity to engage in play, socialize with other children, and take a mental break from their treatments. Your support has created a more positive and welcoming environment for kids in our care.
fields.Map Short Thank You: Thank you for bringing smiles and joy to our children!
fields.Thank You Note Title: Heartfelt Thanks from Lowell General's Kids
fields.Impact Title: Gaming Gear Transforms Pediatric Care at Lowell General

fields.Thank You Note: Thank you for bringing joy to the children at Christus Children’s Hospital! "I love playing games; it makes me feel like I'm on an adventure!" said Lucas, age 6. Your donations have helped create spaces where kids can play and have fun, giving them a sense of normalcy during their hospital stays. The smiles and laughter we see every day are thanks to your generosity. You’ve brought comfort and happiness to our young patients, and we are so deeply grateful for your support.
fields.Impact Text: Christus Children’s Hospital now serves over 600 children each year with gaming equipment that provides entertainment, comfort, and therapeutic relief. “For many kids, these games offer a chance to escape the hospital setting and just be kids,” says Mary Gonzales, our Child Life Manager. The new gaming hubs are now a central part of our pediatric care, allowing children to socialize, relax, and heal in a more supportive environment. Your donations have made a meaningful impact on the lives of our young patients.
fields.Map Short Thank You: Thank you for bringing joy and comfort to our children!
fields.Thank You Note Title: Thank You from Christus Children’s Hospital
fields.Impact Title: How Gaming is Transforming Care at Christus Children’s
